Articles.Content:
<object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" height="378" width="620" id="live_embed_player_flash" data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf?channel=5hoe" bgcolor="#000000"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true" /><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always" /><param name="allowNetworking" value="all" /><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/live_embed_player.swf" /><param name="flashvars" value="hostname=www.twitch.tv&channel=5hoe&auto_play=false&start_volume=25" /></object>

5hoe is one of those streamers you don't want to miss. He pushes his stock install to the limits of what's possible and has a lot of knowledge of almost anything KSP. If you need assistance with your space program that's no problem either, 5hoe will happily help you along by showing you how things work. Apart from his KSP streams he's also a talented photographer and often streams how he uses Photoshop to enhance the pictures he's taken. All in all it's definitely a channel worth visiting at some point.

Streams may contain adult language.

Posted this one manually because Twitch Thursdays didn't get here today

Edited August 1, 2014 by KasperVld
Not to mention he used to be on the KSP team and he's been here a while . Go 5hoe!
